body: The only treasure carried by constructs is usually part of their construction, such as a weapon or magic item. Constructs are, however, typically used to guard more valuable treasures or magic items.
name: Construct
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Appendix/Treasure Generator/Step 2 Determine Treasure Type/Construct

sections.body: E, F (add B, C, H if the creature is guarding a treasure).
sections.name: Treasure Types
